declare @taxProperty varchar(3), @voucherTemplate varchar(32), @taxCode varchar(32), @taxRate numeric(5, 2), @taxAccount varchar(32), @taxType tinyint select @taxProperty = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_tc_thue' select @voucherTemplate = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_mau_ct_dv' select @taxCode = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_thue_1' select @taxRate = a.thue_suat, @taxAccount = rtrim(a.tk_thue_no3), @taxType = b.tk_cn from dmthue a left join dmtk b on a.tk_thue_no3 = b.tk where a.ma_thue = @taxCode if @taxType is null select @taxCode = '', @taxRate = 0, @taxAccount = '', @taxType = 0
select 'this._voucherCode='@@id';this._taxProperty='''+ @taxProperty +''';this._taxCode='''+ @taxCode +''';this._taxRate='+ str(@taxRate) +';this._taxAccount='''+ @taxAccount +''';this._taxType='+ str(@taxType) +';this._voucherTemplate=''' + replace(replace(isnull(@voucherTemplate, ''), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''';load$GridVoucherTax$(this);' as message return
